articles.author: Natalie Oganesyan
articles.title: 'Sisterhood Of The Traveling Pants' Co-Stars Support Blake Lively - Deadline
articles.description: America Ferrera, Amber Rose Tamblyn and Alexis Bledel supported co-star Blake Lively after her suit against 'It Ends With Us' director Justin Baldoni.
articles.content: True to the bond showcased in their 2005 film The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants, America Ferrera, Amber Rose Tamblyn and Alexis Bledel have penned a letter in support of co-star Blake Lively foll… [+3115 chars]

articles.title: This is America’s ‘fatal flaw’ as the US bubble gets ready to pop, market expert warns - Fortune
articles.description: "All the classic signs of extreme prices, valuations and sentiment suggest the end is near."
